acf.title: Global Head of Technology Business Management
acf.bio_copy:
Rut Pugsasin is Global Head of Technology Business Management, Information Technology and responsible for centrally managing Technology’s global book of project work, including budget and headcount management.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2011, Rut was with Citigroup Global Markets, and prior to that, was a Management Analyst at Moore Capital Management. He began his career as an analyst in fixed income structured finance at J.P. Morgan Securities.

Rut received a BS in Business Administration from Stony Brook University.
